Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Irving Park/Keeler
ShortDescription: Eastbound 80 Irving Park buses temp. rerouted via: Irving Park, Cicero, Addison and Pulaski near Irving Park/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses temp. rerouted via: Irving Park, Cicero, Addison and Pulaski near Irving Park/Keeler.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
